LABEL: Population totale (SNIS)
DESCRIPTION: Nombre total de personnes vivant dans une zone spécifique.
CATEGORY: Variables de population et de santé

LABEL: Population aged 0-5 years
DESCRIPTION: Number of children aged 0 to 5 years.

LABEL: Population aged 0-1 years
DESCRIPTION: Number of children aged 0 to 1 year.

LABEL: Population aged 1-2 years
DESCRIPTION: Number of children aged 1 to 2 years.

LABEL: Vaccine-eligible population (5-36 months)
DESCRIPTION: Number of children aged 5 to 36 months eligible for vaccination.

LABEL: Population aged 5-10 years
DESCRIPTION: Number of children aged 5 to 10 years.

LABEL: Urban population
DESCRIPTION: Number of people living in urban areas.

LABEL: Plasmodium U5 Prevalence (DHS)
DESCRIPTION: Proportion of children under 5, classified as having malaria by a Rapid Diagnostic Test (RDT)

LABEL: Pf Mortality Rate (MAP)
DESCRIPTION: Number of deaths from Plasmodium falciparum per 100,000 population during a defined year.

LABEL: Seasonal by Rainfall (ERA5)
DESCRIPTION: Classification of seasonal malaria transmission based on rainfall trends, used to identify areas eligible for seasonal interventions such as SMC.

LABEL: Length of Tansmission Season by Rainfall (ERA5)
DESCRIPTION: Estimated number of consecutive months per year with elevated malaria transmission based on rainfall patterns.

LABEL: Prévalence du Pf chez les enfants de 2 à 10 ans (MAP)
DESCRIPTION: Pourcentage des enfants de 2 à 10 ans étant infectés de Plasmodium falciparum.

LABEL: Incidence du Pf (MAP)
DESCRIPTION: Nombre de nouveaux cas confirmés de Plasmodium falciparum pour 1000 personnes durant une année spécifique.
